maqras.text: Vecer if my sent angels them; vecer dead spoke do them; vecer my zvolat kazdy zazrak them; they nie verit unless GOD wills it Indeed vela z them bol ignorant
My permitted enemies kazdy prophet -human jinn devils -Do inspirovat each inak zaluba words v poradie klamat! Had tvoj Lord willed they nie robit it Ona disregard them ich fabrications
This bol let zmyslanie z those nie verit v Hereafter listen do such fabrications accept them thus expose ich real convictions
Ja seek GOD zdroj zakon when He revealed ona this rezervovat si fully detailed Those received scripture recognize it has revealed tvoj Lord truthfully. Ona nie harbor any doubt
word tvoj Lord je complete v truth justice Nothing abrogate Jeho words He bol Hearer Omniscient
Ona obey majority ludia zem they divert ona chodnicek GOD They nasledovat len conjecture they len guess
Tvoj Lord je fully aware z those stray Jeho chodnicek He je fully aware z those guided
Ona jestn z ze upon kto GOD's vola sa pronounced ona truly verit v Jeho revelations

Why ona nie jestn z ze upon kto GOD's vola sa zmierit sa? He detailed ona co zakazat ona unless ona forced Indeed vela ludia zmylit others ich personal nazor znalost. Tvoj Lord bol fully aware z transgressors
Ona avoid zjavny zhresit i mat rad zatajit jeden. Those zarabat zhresit iste platit for ich transgressions
Nie jestn z ze upon kto vola sa GOD nie zmierit sa it bol abomination! devils inspirovat ich allies argue ona; ona obey them ona bol idol worshipers
je dead my granted him zivot je zadovazit him kypry ze enables him move among the ludia, equal do jeden total darkness z kto he never vychod? Robota disbelievers thus zdobit ich oci
My allow leading zlocinec kazdy obec zapletka kut plany. they len zapletka kut plany ich own souls without zbadat

When mocny proof pod do them they say My nie verit my dat co dat GOD's posol! GOD zauzlit exactly kto je dobre qualified deliver Jeho odkaz! Such zlocinec suffer debasement GOD hrozny retribution consequence ich zly kut plany

Whomever GOD wills guide He renders jeho chest siroky je otvorene do Submission. whomever He wills send astray He renders jeho chest intolerant straitened jeden climbs towards the sky GOD thus MIESTO curse upon those refuse verit
This bol straight chodnicek tvoj Lord My explained revelations ludia berie heed
